name: getCommentProperty
description:
Returns the value of a comment property.

This operation can be accessed anonymously.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:**

 *  *Browse projects* [project permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/yodKLg) for the project.
 *  If [issue-level security](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/J4lKLg) is configured, issue-level security permission to view the issue.
 *  If the comment has visibility restrictions, belongs to the group or has the role visibility is restricted to.

$block: An entity property, for more information see [Entity properties](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/jira/platform/jira-entity-properties/).

$ul: **key**: The key of the property. Required on create and update.
**value**: The value of the property. Required on create and update.
